product_name: The North Face Oso Fleece Hoodie - Toddler Girls'
long_description: The North Face Oso hoodie combines the performance and style of the epic Denali jacket with a soft hood for a blend of style and comfort that toddlers will love. Polyester fleece with a silky-soft surface keeps her warm without weighing her down. Lightweight fabric resists pilling and fading, packs easily and maintains its shape. Reinforced shoulder panels repel light precipitation; tricot-lined pockets warm chilly hands.
short_description: The North Face Oso hoodie combines the performance and style of the epic Denali jacket with a soft hood for a blend of style and comfort that toddlers will love.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Infants And Toddlers
